name: Squammo
description:
Malik has been thrown into a dark and dilapidated underground prison of the future for refusing to obey his producers. There he meets Lira, a forgotten prisoner and victim of neurological experiments, and a shadowy ghostlike entity named Squammo. Together they must navigate mazelike tunnels, solve harrowing puzzles, and battle or escape from deadly patrol drones as they search for a way out. 

Features:
Labyrinth of puzzles.
Deadly droids.
Chase sequences.
Laser battles.
Original soundtrack.


Code and Music created by: Jeremy Smith
www.jeremymichaelsmith.com

Created for Spring 2020 Scream Catalogue SCREAM MACHINE game jam.
Made in RMMV
